bibl.title: A Roman-Period Cession of Residential Property from Soknopaiou Nesos (P. Mich. inv. 6168 + inv. 6174 c + inv. 6174 a+b).
Res severa verum gaudium. Festschrift für Karl-Theodor Zauzich zum 65. Geburtstag am 8. Juni 2004
bibl.author: HICKEY, Todd M.

bibl.note: P. Mich. Inv. 6168 + 6174 c = P. dem. Zauzich 13 (Soknopaiou Nesos, 4 July 29 A.D.) is written in Demotic. P. Mich. Inv. 6174 a+b = P. dem. Zauzich 14, which belongs probably to the same text, is bilingual: 5 lines of demotic text and 8 lines of Greek from the ÍpografÆ (abstract) for a transfer of house property. - Pp. 245-247: Appendix: Material found in house II 202 [in Soknopaiou Nesos]. <hupographe>

bibl.idno: P. Mich. Inv. 6168 + 6174 a+b + 6174 c = P. dem. Zauzich 13-14
